entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or flurries this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
